name: Bright Horizons
description: Program applies science-informed learning framework, Discovery Driven Learning®, and focuses on your child’s individual strengths. The highly trained teachers meet your child where they are, nurture their full potential, and partner with you in their development and future success. Look into the Bright Horizons daycare center near you for more information on their services. This is a national wide program, all listings and information is online, all contact and support is through online account.
